item.title: 情報筋BBCニュースナイトのキャスター、ヴィクトリア・ダービシャーらBBCのジャーナリストは、サン紙が記事を掲載する前にヒュー・エドワーズに関する告発を調べていた（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Sources: BBC Newsnight anchor Victoria Derbyshire and other BBC journalists were examining accusations about Huw Edwards before The Sun published its story  —  EXCLUSIVE: BBC News journalists had begun work on a potential exposé about Huw Edwards prior to The Sun newspaper sparking …

item.title: 英国警察が犯罪の証拠を発見しなかった後、BBCの司会者（後にヒュー・エドワーズと判明）に関する報道をめぐり、サン紙は深刻な問題に直面している（Jim Waterson/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
The Sun faces serious questions over its reporting on a BBC presenter, later revealed to be Huw Edwards, after UK police found no evidence of criminality  —  Days after publication, the newsreader is in hospital with mental health issues and the paper is rapidly backtracking

item.title: SAG-AFTRAとAMPTPの契約交渉が決裂、ギルドの理事会がストライキを承認へ、1980年以来の俳優のストライキとなる（Deadline）
item.description:
Deadline:
Contract negotiations between SAG-AFTRA and the AMPTP break off; the guild's board will now meet to approve a strike, the first actors' strike since 1980  —  Contract negotiations between SAG-AFTRA and the AMPTP broke off tonight, and the guild's national board will meet Thursday morning to formally approve the launch of a strike.

item.title: RokuとComcastのFreeWheelが提携を拡大、チャンネルをまたいだ広告ターゲティングの改善、広告在庫の販売の効率化、なりすましからの保護を目指す（Alyssa Boyle/AdExchanger）
item.description:
Alyssa Boyle / AdExchanger:
Roku and Comcast's FreeWheel expand their partnership to improve ad targeting across channels, streamline selling ad inventory, and protect against spoofing  —  Tired of reading countless headlines about data interoperability?  —  Too bad, because inventory fragmentation on connected TV …

item.title: 世界21のニュースルームが設定したAIガイドラインを分析したところ、人間の監視、透明性、説明責任、責任などを重視していることが判明（Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Nieman Lab:
An analysis of AI guidelines set by 21 newsrooms around the world finds an emphasis on human oversight, transparency, accountability, responsibility, and more  —  What's okay and what's verboten when it comes to AI in the production of news?  Here's how 21 newsrooms in the U.S., Europe …

item.title: フォックスの元幹部3人が、ルパート・マードックがフォックス・ブロードキャスティング、ひいてはフォックス・ニュースを "偽情報マシーン "と呼ぶような会社にしたことを後悔していると語った（BoulderPreston）。
item.description:
BoulderPreston:
Three former Fox executives say they regret helping Rupert Murdoch build Fox Broadcasting, and by extension Fox News, which they call a “disinformation machine”  —  For what little it may, or may not, be worth at this point, Preston Padden, Ken Solomon and Bill Reyner wish …

item.title: アイマックスは、香港で取引される中国子会社を30日間の平均終値より49％高い1億2400万ドルで買収する計画。
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Imax plans to buy out its Hong Kong-traded Chinese subsidiary for $124M, a 49% premium over the 30-day average closing price; Imax China was established in 2011  —  Imax Corp., the operator of big-screen cinemas, is seeking to buy out its Hong Kong-traded Chinese subsidiary in a deal valued at $124 million.

item.title: SEC提出書類：ライオンズゲート、スタジオ事業とStarzを中心とするメディア・ネットワーク事業を2つの公開会社に分離する計画を詳述（Etan Vlessing/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / Hollywood Reporter:
SEC filing: Lionsgate details plans to separate its studio business and its media networks business, which mostly comprises Starz, into two public companies  —  The studio filed a Form 10 registration regarding its planned separation into two publicly-traded companies.

item.title: ディズニー取締役会、ボブ・アイガーのCEO契約を予定より2年長い2026年まで延長。
item.description:
Sarah Whitten / CNBC:
Disney's board extends Bob Iger's contract as CEO through 2026, two years longer than he had planned; Iger was supposed to have prepared his next successor  —  - Disney is extending CEO Bob Iger's contract through 2026.  — Iger told CNBC in February that he had no intention to stay longer …

item.title: Luminateの2023年上半期レポート：オンデマンドのオーディオおよびビデオストリームは世界で前年同期比30.8％増、米国で同15％増、米国のフィジカルアルバム売上は同13.3％増、他（Chris Willman/Variety）
item.description:
Chris Willman / Variety:
Luminate's H1 2023 report: on-demand audio and video streams were up 30.8% YoY globally and 15% YoY in the US, US physical album sales rose 13.3% YoY, and more  —  The vinyl boom is not going bust anytime soon.  In the first half of 2023, vinyl LP sales were up 21.7% from the same period the year before …

item.title: McClatchyがピューリッツァー賞受賞漫画家3人をカット：サクラメント・ビー紙のジャック・オーマン、シャーロット・オブザーバー紙のケヴィン・シアーズ、レキシントン・ヘラルド・リーダー紙のジョエル・ペット（ポール・ベダード／ワシントン・エグザミナー紙）。
item.description:
Paul Bedard / Washington Examiner:
McClatchy cuts three Pulitzer-winning cartoonists: The Sacramento Bee's Jack Ohman, The Charlotte Observer's Kevin Siers, Lexington Herald-Leader's Joel Pett  —  Political junkies lost three Pulitzer Prize-winning cartoonists this week when the McClatchy chain issued a round of cuts that it blamed on changing reader trends.

item.title: ホワイトハウスは、Today News Africaのオーナーで記者のサイモン・アテバに対し、「ブリーフィングの妨害」を続けるのであれば、記者証を「停止または剥奪」する可能性があると警告した（Paul Farhi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Paul Farhi / Washington Post:
The White House warns Today News Africa owner and reporter Simon Ateba that if he continues “to impede briefings”, his press pass “may be suspended or revoked”  —  In a first for Biden's press office, the formal reprimand cites ‘continued interruptions’

item.title: 1月6日の国会議事堂暴動に参加したトランプ支持者のレイ・エップス氏が、同ネットワークとタッカー・カールソン氏が同氏を「FBI」だとの噂を流したため、名誉毀損でフォックス・ニュースを提訴（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Ray Epps, a Trump voter who attended the January 6 Capitol riot, sues Fox News for defamation, after the network and Tucker Carlson spread rumors he was a “fed”  —  Ray Epps, a two-time Trump voter, says Tucker Carlson repeatedly and falsely named him as a covert government agent who incited the Jan. 6 attacks.

item.title: 2023年のエミー賞ノミネート数はHBO/Maxが127で再びトップ、Netflixが103、Hulu/FX on Huluが64、Apple TV+が50、Amazonが45、Disney+が40、ABCが28（Peter White/Deadline）
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
HBO/Max again topped Emmy nominations with 127 in 2023; Netflix got 103, Hulu/FX on Hulu got 64, Apple TV+ got 50, Amazon got 45, Disney+ got 40, and ABC got 28  —  HBO and sister streamer Max remain top of the Emmy nominations pile.  —  The Warner Bros. Discovery network …

item.title: 性的写真購入疑惑で謹慎中のBBC司会者、ヒュー・エドワーズの妻が名乗り。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
Huw Edwards' wife names him as the BBC presenter suspended over allegedly buying sexually explicit photos; police say there's no evidence of a criminal offense  —  News comes shortly after Met says there is no evidence suspended presenter committed criminal offence
